availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Boner Conelly in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on October 20, 1831. Father of Charity Conelly, Thompson Conelly, Barnett P. Conelly, Mary Jane Conelly, Samuel Conelly, Sarah E. Conelly, Cynthia Conelly, Joel J. Conelly, James W. Conelly, Columbus C. Conelly, Martha A. Conelly, John F. Conelly, and Henry Conelly. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 1, p. 379B-380A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 658.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 3, p. 425A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272804.
